title: Nuven Mortgage Opportunity Term Fund 2 (JMT) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuven Mortgage Opportunity Term Fund 2 ( JMT  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.112 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased JMT prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 9th quarter that JMT has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $22.39, the dividend yield is 6%.
The previous trading day's last sale of JMT was $22.39, representing a -7.08% decrease from the 52 week high of $24.10 and a 3.43% increase over the 52 week low of $21.65.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the JMT Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
